name: Point Booster
description: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.
additionalInfo: No longer builds into Eye of Skadi (as of version 7.39)
Now builds into Gleipnir (as of version 7.38)
No longer builds into Wraith Pact (as of version 7.33)
Now builds into Phylactery (as of version 7.33)
